scripts.build:mac:windows: npm run build && npm run prepare:mac:windows
scripts.prepare:mac:windows: rm -rf dist_iis && mkdir dist_iis && cp -R .next/standalone/ dist_iis/ && cp -R .next/static dist_iis/.next/static && cp -R public/ dist_iis/public && cp package.json dist_iis/package.json && cp next.config.mjs dist_iis/next.config.mjs && cp .env.template dist_iis/.env.template  && rm -rf dist_iis/.next/cache && rm -rf dist_iis/node_modules && rm -rf dist_iis/.env
scripts.prepare:windows:
if exist dist_iis rmdir /s /q dist_iis && mkdir dist_iis && xcopy .next\standalone dist_iis\.next\standalone /E /I && xcopy .next\static dist_iis\.next\static /E /I && xcopy public dist_iis\public /E /I && xcopy package.json dist_iis\package.json /I && xcopy next.config.mjs dist_iis
ext.config.mjs /I && xcopy .env.template dist_iis\.env.template /I && xcopy ../installation/tasks dist_iis	asks /E /I && if exist dist_iis\.next\cache rmdir /s /q dist_iis\.next\cache && if exist dist_iis
ode_modules rmdir /s /q dist_iis
ode_modules && if exist dist_iis\.env del dist_iis\.env
